EmailTemplate.description: This notification should go to the CS Acct Mgr and CSMOps
EmailTemplate.name: Reference Program: Account Changed
EmailTemplate.subject: Detached Reference: {!Contact.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.Name} has been moved to {!Account.Name} and previously had a reference status of {!Contact.Reference_Tracking_Status__c}.
Please contact the former CS Account Mgr and contact to determine if reference status should remain.
Please remember to update any reference fields on the contact record, including notes, once determined.
Contact: {!Contact.Link}
